title: What Do the 😫 Tired Face & 😩 Weary Face Emojis Mean?

steps.title: The 😫 represents exhaustion or tiredness.
steps.content: The 😫 represents exhaustion or tiredness. Whether you’re feeling overworked, stressed out, or drained from exercising, or you simply stayed up too late, the 😫 emoji says, “I’m tired!” Because this little emoji looks distressed, send it to your pals to let them know you’re beyond exhausted and can’t work up the motivation to do anything. “Today was so crazy! I just want to fall into bed and sleep after work 😫” “I’m still worn out from that intense workout this morning 😫😫😫”

steps.title: 😫 can express frustration.
steps.content: 😫 can express frustration. When you’re at the end of your rope and feeling exasperated, use the 😫 emoji to get your annoyances and troubles off your chest. This is the perfect emoji to use if you want to complain and vent to your friends. “I’ve been waiting in line for 30 minutes 😫 I’m this close to leaving the store.” “My cat knocked over my favorite plant again 😫”

steps.title: The 😫 emoji can mean you’re upset or agitated.
steps.content: The 😫 emoji can mean you’re upset or agitated. The 😫 emoji is officially called the distraught face emoji, so you can use it to say, “I’m so upset I can’t think straight!” It conveys a variety of negative emotions like feeling worried, troubled, nervous, scared, or confused. “I messed up so bad during the presentation even though I practiced 😫😫😫” “I lost my lucky bracelet! I don’t know what I’m going to do without it 😫”

steps.title: 😫 can express overwhelming feelings of affection or passion.
steps.content: 😫 can express overwhelming feelings of affection or passion. The 😫 emoji perfectly captures that feeling of seeing something so cute or exciting that you can’t even handle it. For instance, you might send this emoji to gush about your new puppy or rave about your favorite musician’s music video. “My puppy is snoring on my lap 😫 He’s so adorable I can’t even 😫” “Did you see Jennie’s new video? She can do no wrong 😫😫😫”

steps.title: The 😩 emoji expresses exhaustion and feeling worn out.
steps.content: The 😩 emoji expresses exhaustion and feeling worn out. Feeling drained or totally pooped? Use the weary face emoji to make it clear you’re tired and in need of some rest and relaxation. This emoji is less upset-looking than the 😫 emoji, so it has a less serious and more lighthearted tone. “I’m in serious need of a nap 😩 I stayed up way too late last night.” “Just got back from a 4-hour hike…I’m ready for bed now LOL 😩”

steps.title: 😩 can mean you’re feeling overwhelmed or frustrated.
steps.content: 😩 can mean you’re feeling overwhelmed or frustrated. If you need to vent or complain, drop 😩 in the chat. This dramatic, self-pitying emoji says, “I can’t handle this!” and lets your friends know you’re stressed out and having a bad day, so you could use some support. [1] X Research source “I left my lunch at home 😩 Now I’m gonna starve to death 😩” “Someone come save me, I’ve been stuck in traffic for hours 😩😩😩”

steps.title: 😩 can indicate you’re overwhelmed with joy or love.
steps.content: 😩 can indicate you’re overwhelmed with joy or love. Have you ever felt the urge to squeeze or shake someone or something because they fill you with so much happiness, pride, or awe? The 😩 emoji conveys those moments when you’re so overwhelmed with positive feelings that you don’t know what to do with them. [2] X Research source “You’re the most talented person I know, I’m so proud of you! 😩” “Simon’s taking me to the beach this weekend! He’s the best boyfriend ever 😩😩”

steps.title: The 😩 can represent groaning or moaning.
steps.content: The 😩 can represent groaning or moaning. With its scrunched-up eyes and frowning mouth, the weary face emoji represents grumbling or groaning in annoyance, despair, or unhappiness. The 😩 can also be used as a sexual innuendo and indicate you’re turned on and ready to get down in the bedroom. “Ugh the construction next door keeps waking me up way too early 😩” “Last night was fun, wanna do it again? 😩😩😩”

steps.title: The 😪 emoji represents tiredness or sleepiness.
steps.content: The 😪 emoji represents tiredness or sleepiness. The sleepy face emoji features closed eyes and a snot bubble coming out of the nose, which is a popular way to convey sleep or sleepiness in anime and cartoons. So, this is the perfect emoji to let your pals know you’re tired and about to catch some Zzs. [3] X Research source “I’m so jet-lagged. I just want to nap 😪” “I’m gonna head to bed 😪 See you in the morning!”

steps.title: 😪 can express sadness or hopelessness.
steps.content: 😪 can express sadness or hopelessness. Lots of people think the sleepy face emoji looks like it’s been crying so much that a snot bubble is coming out of its nose. So, you can use this forlorn little face to say you’re not in the best of spirits, whether you’re feeling discouraged, distressed, or heartsick. “I didn’t make the dance team 😪” “I’m missing Zara so bad rn. Long distance sucks 😪”

steps.title: The 😪 can mean you feel sick.
steps.content: The 😪 can mean you feel sick. Some people call 😪 the snot emoji because it looks like this little face has a runny nose. So, send this emoji to say that you’re feeling under the weather, whether you’ve caught a cold or are dealing with allergies. “I feel awful. I think I’ve got a cold 😪” “My allergies have been so bad lately 😪”

steps.title: The 🥱 emoji expresses tiredness.
steps.content: The 🥱 emoji expresses tiredness. The yawning face emoji is caught in a yawn, so it probably comes as no surprise that it represents feeling tired or sleepy. Use it to let your friends know that you’re exhausted and can’t wait to go to sleep. “I’ve been up since 5 am. I can’t wait to go to bed 🥱” “I was out til 2 am yesterday…today’s gonna be rough 🥱🥱🥱”

steps.title: 🥱 can represent boredom or disinterest.
steps.content: 🥱 can represent boredom or disinterest. If an activity or conversation is putting you to sleep because you find it dull or uninteresting, send the 🥱 emoji. This makes it clear that you’re pretty bored and want to do or talk about something else. [4] X Research source “Bro I almost fell asleep in class I was so bored 🥱🥱🥱” “Can we change the subject? I’m tired of talking about Justin 🥱”

steps.title: 😴 represents sleep or sleepiness.
steps.content: 😴 represents sleep or sleepiness. With its closed eyes and trail of Zzs, the sleeping face emoji means you’re preparing to hit the hay. You might use it to say that you’ve had an exhausting day or send it in a sweet goodnight message to your friend or partner. [5] X Research source “It was a long day. I’m going to binge some TV and then go to bed 😴” “Goodnight! I hope you have sweet dreams 😴😴😴”

steps.title: The 😴 emoji can mean you’re bored.
steps.content: The 😴 emoji can mean you’re bored. If you’re so bored you could fall asleep, add the 😴 to your message. This lets your friend know that whatever you’re doing is uninteresting, or that the conversation you’re having is getting tired, so you want to change the subject. [6] X Research source “Sawyer’s making me watch her fav movie and it’s sooo boring 😴” “I’m sorry I don’t really care about that reality show 😴 Let’s talk about something else…”

steps.title: There are lots of other emojis that express feeling tired or upset.
steps.content: There are lots of other emojis that express feeling tired or upset. Looking for other emojis that represent exhaustion, frustration, distress, or boredom? Check out these other emojis and what they mean: The 😮‍💨 (exhaling face) emoji represents a sigh, so it can mean you feel exhausted, disappointed, nervous, or relieved. The 🫠 (melting face) emoji can express embarrassment, feeling overwhelmed, or nervousness. The 😣 (persevering face) emoji represents feeling overwhelmed, frustrated, sad, or upset. The 😖 (confounded face) emoji can mean you’re overwhelmed, frustrated, confused, or uncomfortable. The 🥴 (woozy face) emoji represents feeling tired, sick, annoyed, or confused. The 🙄 (face with rolling eyes) emoji can mean you’re frustrated or bored. The 😓 (downcast face with sweat) emoji can express frustration or stress.
